Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Miguel’s attention was excellent. We entered in because we were attracted by the jazz band that was playing, and we were lucky because a couple didn’t show up. Great food and excellent service in an amazing place. Repetiremos!!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: This might be my favourite Bar ever! Great and beautiful interior design. Not too crowded with tables. A lot of space to sit at the bar. Amazing beer tasting! Great selection of craft beers and IPAs. Don't pass on the opportunity if you're in the area!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: I love this restaurant. People who work there are very friendly. My kids enjoy the food there and they can play up on the stage. The food options are limited but anything you choose  would be great. Wide range of wine list.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Pompstation offered a well plated menu unfortunately mired by... everything else. …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: We have had some good food here. The beef was very well prepared. But the service was really bad. Upon arrival nobody helpen us to the table. When we gotnour table nobody seemed to be interested in helping us. Even the getting the bill took long.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Friendly, open staff. Really nice terrace, off the beaten track, and not immediately noticable from the front (it's in the back), even though we live around the corner. Interior is really cool, food is fine.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Very cosy and beautiful space to enjoy a very good dinner with live music. The staff were super friendly and accommodating which also made it fun! You can easily spend a whole night there with friends. Looking forward to going again.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: The vegetarian menu was terrible, unfortunately. The starter fried tempeh was disgusting. No vegan choices, all with cheese. They tried to be kind. Still felt uncomfortable with our group. Service could be better. 😕

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: This one was recommended by a local, and it was absolutely amazing  the food, service and ambiance, not in city center but worth the visit. They also have live music performance on selected days, u should book in advance

Name: Het Pompstation

Review Text: Great service and good food

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Very good food and service. Live jazz. Awesome place

Review Text:

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Restaurant with occasionally bands playing jazzy background music. They are known for their steaks but their lobster is also quite good. Their selections of wine is very nice; I recommend the Francis Coppola red wines. I really like their …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and the live bad was good. It takes some waiting between the courses. Starter and dessert were good, fish course could be better. It's a steak place so I would choose steak next time.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Great ambiance. We missed the band! The food is great but on a busy night, the food takes long in coming and the gap between the courses is very long. The steak comes highly recommended.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Very nice terrace for the summer. I had the steak, it was good although not great (a little bit too hard), but the service is quick and efficient and I liked the atmosphere. I would recommend.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: This places is so great! It has an AMAZING patio and friendly staff! I had the octopus tentacles as my starter and I think I almost ate through my plate (so tasty!). …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: One of those places you dont know what to expect from outside but you have a nice surprise when you get in ! Really cool building, cosy decoration and a bit fancy too. Really good good. Large choice of meat and wine. Prices quite reasonable for what you get.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Cool and delicious meal and wine, beautiful, romantic and calm place.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: A great restaurant to visit if you're in Oost. Big, spacious sunny terrace area and a very nice lunch menu

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Bad service if they're over capacity. With a group of 14 waited over an hour for starters, and well over 2.5 hours to get the main dish. Waiter was slow, but drinks arrived fast, but special requests for a vegan dish for one of our people …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Nice venue, great atmosphere, nice live music. The food was good.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Loved it. Very good food, friendly staff. Good environment

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: One of the best restaurants in Amsterdam in my opinion. Great selection of ingredients, and being creative with them, but not too creative :) I can't wait to dine here again.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Awesome atmosphere, food and wine!! Definitely recommend!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text:
One of the most sophisticated meat  places in Amsterdam!
Also, the restaurant itself is built in an old pump facility building, interior is great.
Cozy terrace included )

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: The place looks very nice. The food was good, and they had a good variety of both vegetarian and meat dishes. Seems like the menu changes with the seasons, which is always a good touch, especially a good surprise if you go periodically to …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Because of the weather, it wasn't very busy. The staff were very helpful and had no hesitation to stay a bit longer for a chat. And the food was superb.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Great place if you like steak. Have their own dried meat and serves also the less common cuts. Has often live music.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Fancy looking place, though the food disappoints. The staff is too busy chatting with each other than serving the guests. Never again

Review Text:

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Well worth the journey out from the city centre, the exterior was deceiving as its beautiful inside.. Great food too with friendly staff

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text:

It's a very nice place with lots of space and cute garden outside.

Name: Het Pompstation

Name: Het Pompstation

Review Text: Great place to have great food! Real nice experiance!

Review Text: Great food, very good accompanying wines, and intimate friendly service

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Amazing experiences here even during covid awaiting the live music and regular menu again 🙌

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: The food and atmosphere at the Pompstation is really nice. We had a very well prepared chateau briand and an equally tasty Italian red wine. We will definitely come again!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: One of the best restaurants I have been to. The food was excellent and the building is amazing, great atmosphere. The staff we all very friendly and attentive.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Such a brilliant night! The staff were great and the food was so good and filling I couldn't finish it! The smoking lounge for after was a treat for a non European.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Great venue, amazing staff and incredibly tasty steak and lobster. Our visit was paired with classy live Jazz music, which made our experience truly fantastic.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Nice place for a nice dinner and live music in a old water pump station building. Very cool to see. Meat is the better option, fish may be improved. Crowed during weekends

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Pompstation or Pump Station is a pretty straight forward name for a former water pump station turned into a cosy good restaurant. Was there for a company event and absolutely love the food - quality and nice! I would come again for my personal visit!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: I always go here! Unique staff, fun atmosphere, great music... just love it! A definite fav. of mine :-) Plus, love the live music too. Always something new to see and taste at the Pomp.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text:
Had high expectations but left disappointed. Food was not great and not prepared the way it was ordered. Slow service but very friendly staff.
The place looks nice and has an elegant atmosphere.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Good place to dine. Service is great,  food is good, decorations are great, live music on Friday (perhaps also on another weekend). …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Excellent menú in the niece and cozy place, the restaurant was made in the firestation ancient building, so you can look at any details of firemans tools and what nots. …

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: On a quiet Wednesday evening this restaurant managed to make me wait for 2 hours to get a plate of food in front of me. That's too much to deal with after a day of business meetings. The burger was nothing to write home about.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Great upscale steak house.   Dinner was as ordered and steak was cooked perfect!  To top it all off they had live jazz!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: With a group. Fixed menu of 3 choices (meat fish veggy). Correct price vs quality. Very nice setting.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Excellent meat dishes and starters to match them.. Wine: Try the Parusso Barbera d’Alba.. The apple & rhubarb crumble was a good choice to finish off dinner.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Great food and ambiance but excruciatingly slow service (though friendly). Recommended on live music nights, but plan for a 2.5 hour minimum!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: It delivers what it is supposed to. The steaks are great, the scenery is nice and the personnel is friendly. Downsides are the loud music that makes the conversation somewhat difficult.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Not only was the food wonderful but the people working there could not be more helpful and accommodating. It was a wonderful experience, and I will certainly return.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text:
Very tasty food, accompanied by saxophonist olaf zwetsloot's trio playing beautiful soft modern jazz .
Highly recommended.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: It was absolutely wonderful, great steaks (not the best place for vegetarians!) Nice drinks and unsure of the price as work paid!

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Interesting place with live music, quite romantic. One of the best stake places in the city, nice desserts. Decent service, prices are ok.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Overpriced and overrated. We were 5 people and everyone ordered a different meal, but only one of us was happy with her choice.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Decent food but the service was really nothing to cheer for. They weren't understaffed or anything. They just didn't pay attention to you.

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Different sort of interior. The starters were good and presented well. The main course and dessert were just average. The staffs are very friendly .

Name: Het Pompstation
Review Text: Really nice place, food and presentation was great. Only problem was very slow service which doesn't suit a restaurant like this..
